title: Dina Srinivasan: Tech Monopolies Need to Be Broken Up
itunes:title: Dina Srinivasan: Tech Monopolies Need to Be Broken Up
description: Digital technology researcher and lawyer Dina Srinivasan discusses the ways in which digital tech companies such as Facebook and Google take advantage of their monopoly positions to the detriment of competition and of the public.
content:encoded: Digital technology researcher and lawyer Dina Srinivasan discusses the ways in which digital tech companies such as Facebook and Google take advantage of their monopoly positions to the detriment of competition and of the public.
